data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Dibang Valley.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Dibang Valley, Arunachal Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Dibang Valley, Arunachal Pradesh, India so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 will die without Jesus in the next month in Dibang Valley, Arunachal Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Dibang Valley, Arunachal Pradesh, India.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the county of Dibang Valley to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Khampa Eastern people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Dibang Valley, Arunachal Pradesh, India.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the county of Dibang Valley to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Father, encourage the 88 believers in Dibang Valley to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.
